sentences.sentence: With luck they will be hard to vandalise.
sentences.translation: 幸运的是，它们也很难被弄坏。

sentences.sentence: Some have tried to blow it up or otherwise vandalise it.
sentences.translation: 有些人想要炸掉它或者是破坏它。

sentences.sentence: I think whoever did it made a very clear point, but nothing has changed. Should we vandalise all the decorations to show our sentiments?
sentences.translation: 我想不管是谁干的都很清楚地说明了一个问题，但是宾馆方面并没有任何改变，难道我们要毁掉所有的装饰才能表达我们的心情吗？
